title: College of Economic and Social Development
content: Feb 27 2025 Three Professors from Our Institute Appointed as Specially Engaged Experts in the Tianjin CPPCC Advisory Talent Pool On February 26, 2025, the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) held an appointment ceremony for experts selected into its Advisory Talent Pool. The meeting was attended by Wang Changsong, Secretary of the Party Leadership Group and Chairman of the Tianjin CPPCC, as well as CPPCC leaders Sun Wenkui, Zhao Haishan, Shang Binyi, Yang Bing, an...
